flawed_nl_solution:
He has to read 350 pages a week because 7 x 50 = <<7*50=350>>350
He has read 264 pages because 43+65+28+70+56 = <<43+65+28+70+56=264>>264
He has to read 86 pages on Saturday because 350-264 =<<350-264=86>>86

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 262, not 264. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
